author: costin
msg: Removed the CommandLineCompiler.
The Mangler part is now a separate component in the toolbox.
The "extend Compiler" part is no longer needed - we can just use the
provided Compiler.
( JspC and the other are also simplified - next commit )

author: costin
msg: Removed the mangler and options from tomcat33 liaison.
We're moving ( as proposed by Mel ) to a toolbox aproach, with a number
of manglers, options, etc that you can combine to implement the adapter
between jasper and a container.
JspServlet will remain the "default" one for easiest integration (
after refactoring, loader changes and some extra docs ), but to provide
container-specific features to jasper you'll need to use callbacks
and maybe modified implementations for the tools.

author: costin
msg: Other changes to ContainerLiaison.

author: costin
msg: Added the page info from JspContext into JspPageInfo.
Still to do: some of the information is specific to jsp->java->class scheme,
we may need to create another abstraction ? ( for now it's simpler this
way, there are just few fields and we don't have other generators )
Use ContainerLiaison for callbacks.

author: costin
msg: Turned the JavaCompiler interface into a class.
Moved duplicated code into it, that will simplify the liaison.
Still todo - move the compiler detection code from JspInterceptor ( detect
if jikes is available, more self-configuration )
